measure.comment: The max-width value for the .sprk-u-Measure class.

narrow-measure.comment: The max-width value for the .sprk-u-Measure--narrow class.

webfonts.comment: Expects a Sass List containing one or more nested Sass Lists. The nested lists should each contain: A List of urls to download a font, the name of the font and the weight of the font.

font-display.comment: The supplied value will be set on all generated Font-face calls, as font-display. The default is 'swap.'

using-webfonts.comment: Boolean value for if the app is using webfonts.

mark-color.comment: The color of the Page Title mark

mark-width.comment: The width of the Page Title mark

mark-height.comment: The height of the Page Title mark

mark-height-wide-viewport.comment: The height of the mark on a large viewport (using $sprk-typography-breakpoint)

mark-padding.comment: Amount of padding between the mark and the text on the page title mark.

mark-padding-wide-viewport.comment: Amount of padding between the mark and the text on a large viewport (using $sprk-typography-breakpoint).

display-one.comment: The font-family, including fallbacks of TypeDisplayOne.

display-two.comment: The font-family, including fallbacks of TypeDisplayTwo.

display-three.comment: The font-family, including fallbacks of TypeDisplayThree.

display-four.comment: The font-family, including fallbacks of TypeDisplayFour.

display-five.comment: The font-family, including fallbacks of TypeDisplayFive.

display-six.comment: The font-family, including fallbacks of TypeDisplaySix.

display-seven.comment: The font-family, including fallbacks of TypeDisplaySeven.

body-one.comment: The font-family, including fallbacks of TypeBodyOne.

body-two.comment: The font-family, including fallbacks of TypeBodyTwo.

body-three.comment: The font-family, including fallbacks of TypeBodyThree.

body-four.comment: The font-family, including fallbacks of TypeBodyFour.

display-one.comment: The size of TypeDisplayOne when the viewport is narrower than $sprk-font-size-display-one-breakpoint.

display-one-wide.comment: The size of TypeDisplayOne when the viewport is wider than $sprk-font-size-display-one-breakpoint.

display-two.comment: The size of TypeDisplayTwo when the viewport is narrower than $sprk-font-size-display-two-breakpoint.

display-two-wide.comment: The size of TypeDisplayTwo when the viewport is wider than $sprk-font-size-display-two-breakpoint.

display-three.comment: The size of TypeDisplayThree when the viewport is narrower than $sprk-font-size-display-three-breakpoint.

display-three-wide.comment: The size of TypeDisplayThree when the viewport is wider than $sprk-font-size-display-three-breakpoint.

display-one.comment: The weight of the TypeDisplayOne font.

display-two.comment: The weight of the TypeDisplayTwo font.

display-three.comment: The weight of the TypeDisplayThree font.

display-four.comment: The weight of the TypeDisplayFour font.

display-five.comment: The weight of the TypeDisplayFive font.

display-six.comment: The weight of the TypeDisplaySix font.

display-seven.comment: The weight of the TypeDisplaySeven font.

body-one.comment: The weight of the TypeBodyOne font.

body-two.comment: The weight of the TypeBodyTwo font.

body-three.comment: The weight of the TypeBodyThree font.

body-four.comment: The weight of the TypeBodyFour font.

display-one.comment: The line-height of the TypeDisplayOne font when the viewport is narrower than $sprk-font-size-display-one-breakpoint.

display-one-wide.comment: The line-height of the TypeDisplayOne font when the viewport is wider than $sprk-font-size-display-one-breakpoint.

display-two.comment: The line-height of the TypeDisplayTwo font when the viewport is narrower than $sprk-font-size-display-two-breakpoint.

display-two-wide.comment: The line-height of the TypeDisplayTwo font when the viewport is wider than $sprk-font-size-display-two-breakpoint.

display-three.comment: The line-height of the TypeDisplayThree font when the viewport is narrower than $sprk-font-size-display-three-breakpoint.

display-three-wide.comment: The line-height of the TypeDisplayThree font when the viewport is wider than $sprk-font-size-display-three-breakpoint.

collision-top-crop.comment: The top crop value for line height collision correction.

collision-bottom-crop.comment: The bottom crop value for line height collision correction.

one-breakpoint.comment: The width of the viewport at which to switch the font size from $sprk-font-size-display-one to $sprk-font-size-display-one-wide.

two-breakpoint.comment: The width of the viewport at which to switch the font size from $sprk-font-size-display-two to $sprk-font-size-display-two-wide.

three-breakpoint.comment: The width of the viewport at which to switch the font size from $sprk-font-size-display-three to $sprk-font-size-display-three-wide.
